column3: Latest;Banteay Meanchey:------ An operation against an illegal business took place on the afternoon of December 11
column7: ------Poipet City------.------Inspection of the site (the business name or operation isn’t yet clear
column8: likely something online) led to the detention of 55 foreign nationals including Chinese and Malaysians.------They were arrested for not having passports/visa or working permits properly updated. They were sent to the provincial police commission to take legal action.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/278167
